name: useStep
description: Custom hook that manages and navigates between steps in a multi-step process.

props.name: maxStep
props.description: The maximum step in the process.

schema.name: canGoToNextStep
schema.description: Check if the next step is available.

schema.name: canGoToPrevStep
schema.description: Check if the previous step is available.

schema.name: goToNextStep
schema.description: Go to the next step in the process.

schema.name: goToPrevStep
schema.description: Go to the previous step in the process.

schema.name: reset
schema.description: Reset the step to the initial step.

schema.name: setStep
schema.description: Set the current step to a specific value.
